title: Ice Castle - A 16 bit inspired ice fantasy
description: An icy 16 bit era inspired audio adventure
longDescription:
This pack has been designed to evoke the feeling of a 16 bit era adventure game. Set in a frozen landscape, our hero is summoned to begin his quest through shimmering, shivering peril!

There are 11 unique tracks broken down into loopable parts that you can combine to best suit your project. Along with this is a small collection of appropriate icy sounds!


The tracks:

Dawn of Questing: The adventure begins as our hero accepts their fate - an upbeat track tinged with danger and nostalgia

Mirrored Wilderness - You feel lost with the dizzying prospects ahead - backwards is forwards, up is down in thie reverby tune

Level Up Caven: You feel the danger all around you, hiding in the shaddows - a mysterious, echoey song

Mysterious Wind: With your last win echoing in your head you face the unknown ahead - a darker take on Level Up Caven

Tundra Turnaround: You contemplate all that's been lost and won as the landscape opens up infront of you - a more upbeat, resolved but short track

Boss Battle Bonanza - The real challenge is on it's way! Battle through this spooky, energetic track!

Hit the Slopes - The stakes are high!! High Energy, icy frenzy!

Healing Wind - A time to pause and reflect - a calm, spacious, ambient soundscape

Crystal Shards - A crunchy upbeat number

Ice Breath - Picture a cool mountaintop - breathy, whimsical

Peril - The sound of defeat!

Recharge - Like a cold shower!



Suggested order:

Dawn of Questing

Mirrored Wilderness

Level Up Caven or Mysterious Wind

Tundra Turnaround

Boss Battle Bonanza

Hit The Slopes

Healing Wind or Healing Wind Dark

Listen to previews here: Stream G Clef music | Listen to songs, albums, playlists for free on SoundCloud
technicalDetails:
Features: 11 unique, looping tracks to accompany your adventure. Most tracks are broken down into looping sections that you can combine however you like.

  •  
  •  
  •  

Number of Audio Wavs: 53

Number of Audio Cues: 53

Sample rate / bit rate: 4,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 29:56 continuous / infinate looping combinations and some one shot sounds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
